front.title: ALTO Protocol Extension For Overlay Routing

abstract.t: This document describes an ALTO protocol extension for overlay routing. It considers three different methods to route traffic from a data source to a data receiver, which are direct Internet routing, VPN tunnel, and overlay routing via intermediate/relay node(s), analyze their use cases in real world and then proposes an extension to ALTO protocol so as to support a ALTO client to get cost value between hosts via these different routing methods.
